meanings.definition: A substance that causes decay or decomposition.
meanings.sent1: The putrefiers in the compost pile help break down the food scraps.
meanings.sent2: The putrefiers in the soil play a vital role in recycling nutrients.
meanings.sent3: The putrefiers in the garbage bin were having a party, turning everything into mush.
meanings.sent4: The putrefiers of time slowly erode the once grand structures of the ancient city.
meanings.sent5: The putrefiers lurking in the shadows of the forest give life to new growth.

meanings.definition: Those who cause decay or decomposition.
meanings.sent1: The reckless putrefiers of the environment left a trail of destruction behind them.
meanings.sent2: The putrefiers of society spread negativity wherever they go.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous putrefiers in the kitchen turned the fresh fruits into a mushy mess.
meanings.sent4: The corrupt politicians were the putrefiers of the nation, slowly decaying its integrity.
meanings.sent5: The careless actions of the putrefiers led to the downfall of the once prosperous town.
